actions.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated into H.R.1305.

official_title: To amend the Boston National Historical Park Act of 1974 to authorize a cooperative agreement with the Boston Public Library for the distribution of informational and interpretive materials relating to the park and to the Freedom Trail.

summary.text: Amends the Boston National Historical Park Act to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to enter into a cooperative agreement with the Boston Public Library to provide for the distribution of informational and interpretive materials relating to the Park and the Freedom Trail.

titles.title: To amend the Boston National Historical Park Act of 1974 to authorize a cooperative agreement with the Boston Public Library for the distribution of informational and interpretive materials relating to the park and to the Freedom Trail.
